channel.title: Coding on Gabe Nespoli
channel.description: Recent content in Coding on Gabe Nespoli

item.title: An R tool for assessing when averages are stable
item.description: This is a project for assessing when averages become stable. The R code can be found on Github at gabenespoli/resampling, and the working paper can be found on the OSF page (Open Science Framework).

item.title: PHZLAB
item.description: PHZLAB is a MATLAB Toolbox for analyzing physiological data, both peripheral (e.g., EDA, EMG) and neural (i.e., ABR). It can be found on Github at gabenespoli/phzlab.

item.title: Vim plugins
item.description: I have written a few vim plugins. vim-cider-vinegar vim-mutton
